channel.title: Search on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Search on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - CRUD
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - CRUD Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1124 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/13_shopParameters/07_search/01_search/01_CRUDSearch.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Shop Parameters >Search Search page is well displayed Click on Add new alias a new page is displayes named : Add new Create a new aliase >click on save a new alias is added to the list .

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Filter, sort, pagination, Bulk actions
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Filter, sort, pagination, Bulk actions Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1123 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/13_shopParameters/07_search/01_search/02_filterSortPaginationAndBulkActions.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Bo > Shop parameters > Search Title page contains ‘Search’ Click to “Add new alias” Title page contains ‘Add new’ Create 39 new alias “Successful creation” notification You’ve got 41 alias Click on the number next to “Display” and select a number You’ve got 20 alias in this page and 3 pages Click to page 3 Page 3 is displayed, you’ve got 1 alias on this page and you’ve got 3 page Click on the left arrow next to the First page Page 2 is displayed, you’ve got 20 alias on this page and you’ve got 3 page Click on the left arrow next to the First page Page 1 is displayed, you’ve got 20 alias on this page and you’ve got 3 page Click on the double right arrow next to the last page Page 3 is displayed, you’ve got 1 alias on this page and you’ve got 3 page Click on the number next to “Display” and select a number You’ve got 41 alias on this page and 1 page Sort by Aliases acs table is sorted by Aliases desc (a > b> c) Sort by Aliases desc table is sorted by Aliases desc (c > b> a) Sort by Search acs table is sorted by Search desc (a > b> c) Sort by Search desc table is sorted by Search desc (c > b> a) Filter Search by Aliases Number of Search < Total of Search

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Indexing
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Indexing Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1127 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Search > Block Indexing See Indexed products 19 / 19. Add a product > Put online Product is created Go back to BO > Shop Parameters > Search > Block Indexing See Indexed products 20 / 20.
